name: 林雅惠
objective:
本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進，如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1. 策略管理的意義，2. 企業內外在環境分析，3. 策略制定，4. 策略執行與評估，5. 事業階層策略，6. 公司策略，7. 購併。
The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

Week2:What is Strategy?(II)

Week5:National Holiday

Week7:Resource and Capability (I)
Week8:Resource and Capability (II)
Week9:Midterm
Week10:Business-Level Strategy through "Generic Strategies"(I)
Week11: Business-Level Strategy through "Generic Strategies"(II)
Week12:Innovation strategies (I)
Week13:Innovation strategies (II)
Week14:Global strategies (I)
Week15:Global strategies (II)
Week16:Final Presentation
Week17:Final Presentation
Week18:Final exam
